role.argrole: thing arg0 makes an attempt to make

example.parse: (IP (PP-MNR (P 经过) (NP (NN 打听))) (PU ，) (NP-PN-SBJ (NR 莺歌) (NN 陶瓷) (NN 博物馆)) (VP (VV 找) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (QP (CD 一) (CLP (M 位))) (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (ADVP (AD 曾)) (PP-BNF (P 替) (NP-PN (ADJP (JJ 史前)) (NP (NN 博物馆)))) (VP (VV 仿制)))) (DEC 的))) (ADJP (JJ 老)) (NP (NN 先生))) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 试做)))))
